specification.title: Google Support Lead Generation Technical Implementation Appointment

content.meeting_platform: Google Meet with screen sharing capability
required_attendees: Person with admin access to website source code
Person with administrative access to Google Ads account
Person with administrative access to Analytics account
content.acceptance_deadline: Within 24 hours of scheduled time or appointment will be canceled

pre_call_requirements.website_backup: Must complete full website backup before call
pre_call_requirements.google_meet_setup: Must have Google Meet configured for screen sharing
pre_call_requirements.pre_call_checklist: Must review provided checklist before call
